Skills: Bachelor’s Degree in Mechanical Engineering from an internationally recognized accredited University
A membership with internationally recognized Chartered Institute is required.
A Minimum ten (10) years of professional experience in building services engineering or Maintenance services or Facilities Management Company.
Grade “A” certification from MME Committee for Accreditation of Engineers & Consultancy Offices.
A proven, successful track record of consistent achievement in Maintenance services or Facilities Management Company
Working knowledge of the GCC countries.
